content.content: 1. (1) For the purposes of section 11.9 of the Act, (a) asset retirement obligations are prescribed as newly recognized liabilities; and (b) April 1, 2022 is prescribed as the corresponding recognition date for those liabilities. (2) In this section, “asset retirement obligations” means legal obligations associated with the retirement of a tangible capital asset resulting from its acquisition, construction, development or normal use.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the purposes of section 11.9 of the Act,

(a) asset retirement obligations are prescribed as newly recognized liabilities; and

(b) April 1, 2022 is prescribed as the corresponding recognition date for those liabilities.

(2) In this section, “asset retirement obligations” means legal obligations associated with the retirement of a tangible capital asset resulting from its acquisition, construction, development or normal use.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
